Helper function: ENA data retrieval

fetch_ena_data.Rd

Retrieves sequence data from the ENA (European Nucleotide Archive) based on country and date range.

Usage

fetch_ena_data(country, date_range)

Arguments

country

Character string specifying the country.

date_range

A Date vector of length 2 specifying start and end dates.

Value

A data.table containing ENA sequence data.

Details

This function sends a query to the ENA API using the provided filters and returns the results in tabular format suitable for downstream analysis.

On this page
